plugin.name: Yield
plugin.author: Can Guan
plugin.description: Statistical Process Control and Analysis is a method of quality control which employs statistical methods to monitor and control a process. This helps ensure the process operates efficiently, producing more specification-conforming products with less waste. SPC can be applied to any process where the conforming product output can be measured. Key tools used in SPC include run charts, control charts, a focus on continuous improvement, and the design of experiments.
